1758389425.MESSAGE_TEXT: Meet the CSR2 update 6.0.0! A new version has pulled up to the line! Update to keep your race action fast and your car collection growing with new events and a smoother gameplay experience!

1757709775.MESSAGE_TEXT:
Meet the hub update 1.1.5! 
What's new: 
- DONATE: enabled and top-donates added
- AUTOSHOW: added fast snap-full export
- gitbox-mini: updated visual special for gacha imports
- added special hyperlink to our email
- fix errors and optimization 

Happy racing!
